results.title: Set of 6 "live laugh love" note cards with envelopes--Live Laugh Love--friendship card--nature letters--nature lover--rustic friendship card
results.description:
Nature letters spell out Live, Laugh, Love. Perfect to send to a nature-loving friend. This set includes 6 note cards and envelopes in gray and brown earth tones. Cards come in a handmade drawstring bag. Cards are 4.25 inches x 5.5 inches. Inside is blank. Nature letter photos were taken in Reno, Nevada, USA.

One customer said, "I ran out and on short notice needed more of these beautiful cards. Katie completed them the same day I emailed her. I was thrilled! Excellent customer service and of course an excellent product! "

results.title: Bombay Company Porcelain Candle and Trinket Box Purple and Violet Flower Lid LIVE LOVE LAUGH  Gold Accents & Gold Clasp Mint Condition Unlit
results.description:
Exquisite porcelain trinket box with a white candle under the hinged lid.  By The Bombay Co., this collectible has a bright violet and purple flower on top with the words Live Laugh Love on the flat center.  It’s one of a series of boxes of this kind issued by Bombay.  Shiny gold provides a brilliant  accent on the etched bands that circle the bottom of the lid and top of the box, with more gold on the clasp and a floral medallion that hangs from a string.  
Inside is a white candle - unlit.  Once the candle has burned away, the box can be used to store all kinds of treasures.  
The body is decorated with yellow,  white and gold vertical stripes.  The box measures 4-1/4” high with a top diameter of 2-3/4”  and is in MINT, as new condition, perfect for gifting.  No original box but I’ll provide a gift box for it.

results.title: Live Every Moment | Sublimation Transfer
results.description:
This is a sublimation transfer and you must have a heat press to apply.

Application Recommendations:

Set heat temperature to 385 degrees Fahrenheit.
Place shirt on heat press.
I recommend putting a piece of Kraft paper in the middle of the shirt to avoid bleeding.
It is also recommended to use a shirt that is 100% polyester, however you can use a 65% polyester shirt but the color will not be as vibrant and may fade.
The fabric should be white or light colored.
Place transfer face down on the shirt.
Press for 60-85 seconds at low-medium pressure. {This is dependent on material}
Remove paper and transfer immediately.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION:

Color may vary due to screen resolutions and displays.

All measurements are approximate and will be sized according to the design.

NO DIGITAL FILE INCLUDED
TRANSFER ONLY - NO GARMENTS INCLUDED

results.title: Magnolia Design Co DIY Kit Live Love Laugh Wood House Reusable Adhesive Silkscreen Stencil Chalk Paste DIY Craft Kit Sweet Chalkin Woman
results.description:
Magnolia Design Co DIY Kit Live Love Laugh Wood House Reusable Adhesive Silkscreen Stencil Chalk Paste DIY Craft Kit Sweet Chalkin Woman

This is a kit I put together for those that like to create their own home decor or gifts. It also gives you an opportunity to try our awesome Magnolia Design Co. products. Right now I only have one kit available, but I've ordered more stencils, so I will have multiple kits available soon so that you can buy as many as you'd like! 

NOTE: EACH kit comes with the following:

-ONE "Live Love Laugh" 5x7" reusable self-adhesive silkscreen/vinyl stencil
-ONE pine wood board custom cut (unfinished) into the shape of a house (sanded); it measures approx. 9" tall (to peak) x 6" wide x 3/4" deep. It stands up well by itself.
-CHOOSE ONE of the sample chalk paste colors from the colors that you see: brilliant white, coal black, chocolate brown, tiffany teal, pansy purple or candy apple red.
-ONE mini squeegee
-ONE stir stick
-ONE instruction "how to" sheet (it's on the back of the stencil packaging)

Everything you need to create something fun while spending time together crafting/creating. Think Art Class!

*IMPORTANT NOTE/STEP: I am sending the wood house unfinished (it's sanded) so that you can choose to either leave natural or paint whatever color you'd like. Important: You should use some type of wax on it and let it dry a few hours Before you apply the stencil, so that the stencil doesn't stick and ruin the stencil or pull up the chalk paste. You should also "FUZZ" the stencil quite a few times on a towel before placing it on the board so that it doesn't pull up the paste/paint. The wax that I use is shown in the last picture.

----------------

Do you love to create beautiful high-end DIY? If you're crafty or even not so crafty, this is an easy foolproof way to design beautiful projects for your home, office, to give as gifts, etc. Join me on my Magnolia Design Co. journey! I am a Founding Member of Magnolia Design Co. The stencils are reusable (wash after use and place on backing). The chalk pastes and inks are super easy to use! We carry many different sizes of stencils, surfaces, chalk pastes, inks, and accessories. Our products can be used on almost any surface, i.e. wood, glass, plastic, metal, fabric, etc.

DIRECTIONS: Using our products is as easy as 1-2-3, First, put the stencil on a towel a few times to "fuzz it", put the stencil on the surface, stir the chalk paste and apply it with the mini squeegee and then peel away the stencil to reveal the finished project. If the chalk paste seems a little dry due to shipping, you can squirt a tiny bit of distilled water into it and stir before applying. It should be the consistency of sour cream or yogurt. Easy Peasy!

*Important: Be sure to wash your stencil immediately after use to prevent clogging in the silkscreen. Run under cool water and lightly rub off the chalk paste. Lay flat to dry (front side facing down). Use a clorox (or similar) wipe on the backside too if you have one, as it will help keep it sticky for future uses. It is reusable!

Be sure to visit my SweetChalkinWoman Facebook page at: www.facebook.com/SweetChalkinWoman to see all of our great products and stay up-to-date on all of our new releases and much more! Feel free to give it a "Like" while you're there :)

NOTE: You can also browse and/or purchase any of our products (stencils, chalk pastes, inks, surfaces & accessories) directly from me through my Sweet Chalkin Woman shop website at: https://sweetchalkinwoman.magnoliadesignco.com

At my website, you also have an option to join my team to become a creator, wherein you'll receive a large discount on all items you purchase and have zero ($0) monthly or quarterly quotas to meet .... win-win. Message me if you would like additional information. It's just an option, not necessary.

**Buy as many as you'd like. I'm happy to combine shipping if you convo me before purchase.

**You can also join my SweetChalkinWoman FB VIP page that is just for my customers for special deals, etc. at: https://www.facebook.com/groups/926150157753436

To see all the other items in my vintage/handmade shop, please click on this link: www.etsy.com/shop/TimelessTreasuresbyM

º©©º°¨¨¨¨¨¨°º©©º°¨¨¨¨¨°º©©º

Be assured that your purchase will be packaged very carefully and insured/tracked when mailed. **Our shop is known to use large amounts of bubble wrap!**

If you decide to purchase multiple items, we would be happy to combine shipping costs, if possible. To do so, please convo us for a shipping quote before purchasing and checking out. With vintage pieces, please note there can be minor imperfections (which we feel only add to the character of the item). We take the time to describe our items carefully and will note any imperfections seen. But, if you would like additional photos or have any questions, please convo us before purchase. These are used vintage pieces and sold as is; all sales are final, no refunds or returns, but you have 3 hours to cancel your order. Please review our shop policies, as your purchase indicates you have read and agree with them.

Thank you for visiting TimelessTreasuresbyM and please stop by again.

results.description:
Welcome to Luxe Loft! All of our designs can be made into decal stickers OR single use stencils for painting on a surface! Simply indicate in the text box when you order whether you would like a DECAL or a STENCIL!

Luxe Loft's Live Laugh Love Wall Decal is a beautiful inspirational wall decal that will look great in your living room. It says : Live every moment - laugh every day - love beyond words. This is one of my favorite inspirational wall decals and is a great reminder of how we we should be living our lives every day. These wall decals are made of high quality removable vinyl and will adhere to any clean and smooth or lightly textured surface. Our stickers are all custom designed and made by our small family business in the US. 

We offer many sizes and colors, so you can be sure our Live Laugh Love quotes will fit in your space and match the color of your wall decor.

All our decals come with complimentary instructions and a squeegee applicator.

results.description:
This limited edition handmade macrame bracelet uses a square knot on .5mm black nylon "Chinese Knotting Cord" separated by an 18K vermeil gold plated 925 silver Live Love Laugh charm in the center. Each thread is finished with a coordinating Swarovski crystal, and the bracelet dangles a made with love charm.

Artefacet aims to give you classy casual jewelry that will look great with any outfit or style! This bracelet is adjustable and available in a variety of colors upon request. These bracelets look great by themselves, layered with other bracelets, or with a watch. If you are looking for something in particular let me know. I encourage you to customize and am always eager to try new and fresh design ideas.

To order, Click "Add to Cart". If you would like a custom size please include the measurement in the "Note" section at checkout. Bracelets come in a golden organza gift bag and are shipped USPS First Class Mail with delivery confirmation.
